original_text: A storm with bright lightning came from the throne. There was the loud noise of thunder. In front of the throne there were seven lights of fire burning brightly. These lights are the seven spirits of God.
korean_text: 보좌로부터 번개와 음성과 우렛소리가 나고 보좌 앞에 켠 등불 일곱이 있으니 이는 하나님의 일곱 영이라

sentences.original_text: A storm with bright lightning came from the throne
sentences.korean_translation: 밝은 번개를 동반한 폭풍이 옥좌에서 왔다

sentences.original_text: There was the loud noise of thunder
In front of the throne there were seven lights
These lights are the seven spirits of God
